page.description: The designer created this dialog with the List View Genie.

section.description: The most interesting thing about this list view is the formatting that causes the colored stripes. To create this effect the designer:

step.description: Click the '...' button in the Display Options > Define Advanced Formatting field to display the Advanced Formatting dialog box.
Entered "2" into the Number of rows in each band text box.
Selected "Dirty White" in the Even Band Background Color list.
